summary: Former acclaimed dancer Na Young-sae (Park Keon-Hyeong) attempts to make a comeback after his opponent, Hyun-soo (Yoon Chan), purposely injures him at a dance competition. At the suggestion... See full summary »
cast: Geun-young Moon|Keon-hyeong Park|Yu-mi Jeong|Gi-su Kim|Ji-yeong Kim|Ji-yeon Lim|Ha-Yoon Song|Park Won-Sang|Chang Yun
title: Daenseo-ui sunjeong
